title: Dragonfly Takes One Step Forward, But Only One
summary: NASA’s Dragonfly mission to Saturn’s moon Titan is one step closer to final approval today. A dual-quadcopter that will fly over Titan’s surface, Dragonfly successfully passed a milestone review that […]

title: Firefly Set to Launch Lockheed Martin Tech Demo In December
summary: Firefly set to launch their next Alpha rocket in December, carrying Lockheed Martin Electronically Steerable Antenna Payload Tech Demo

title: NASA Delays Dragonfly Mission To Titan
summary: The Director of NASA’s Planetary Science Division has announced a one-year delay in the launch of the Dragonfly mission to Saturn’s moon Titan.

title: Industry group opposes White House mission authorization proposal
summary: An industry group says it is opposed to a White House proposal for regulating novel space activities, arguing it could be burdensome and confusing for companies and agencies.

title: Millennium Space to build a missile-sensor layer in medium Earth orbit
summary: The U.S. Space Force has given Millennium Space Systems the go-ahead to begin production of six satellites that will be deployed in medium Earth orbit to detect and track ballistic and hypersonic missiles.
